Events that occurred on 10 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1922 - Árpád Göncz, translator and former President of Hungary, is born.
1939 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 36.
1946 - John Tolkien is given his Orders as a priest.
1952 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 132.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Donald A. Wollheim.
1992 - Actor Charlie Vickers is born.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
North of Sarn Gebir, Uglúk encounters Grishnákh for the first time.
